name: PiG Sty Festival
description: The PiG Sty Festival is a week-long 24 hours a day event featuring a high level pro tournament, entertaining side-show show matches, and frivolous carnival games.

name: DreamHack Masters Fall 2021
description: The DreamHack SC2 Masters Fall is the second of the three online events of the ESL Pro Tour 2021/22 Circuit. It is organized by DreamHack in cooperation with ESL.

name: IEM Katowice 2021
description: IEM Katowice 2021 is the final tournament of the ESL Pro Tour 2020/21 Circuit, also known as Masters Championship 2021.

name: Cheeseadelphia Winter Championship 2021
description: Nerd Street Gamers is hosting the Cheeseadelphia Winter Championship 2021, an online Starcraft II tournament with a $10,000 prize pool in which first place takes home $3,500.

name: DreamHack Masters - Last Chance 2020
description: The DreamHack SC2 Masters Last Chance 2021 is the last-chance online event of the ESL Pro Tour 2020/21 Circuit. It is organized by DreamHack in cooperation with ESL.

name: TeamLiquid StarLeague 6
description: The TeamLiquid StarLeague 6, announced on November 10, 2020, is the fourth TSL event held for StarCraft II.

name: DreamHack Masters Winter 2020
description: The DreamHack SC2 Masters Winter is the third and last online event of the ESL Pro Tour 2020/21 Circuit. It is organized by DreamHack in cooperation with ESL.

name: King of Battles: KB International Championship
description: The King of Battles: KB International Championship is a GSL style tournament, consisting of 16 players (8 Korean and 8 Non-Korean players) fighting for 1280 EPT Global Points and a $30,000 USD prize pool.

name: DreamHack Masters Fall 2020
description: The DreamHack SC2 Masters Fall is the second of the three online events of the ESL Pro Tour 2020/21 Circuit. It is organized by DreamHack in cooperation with ESL.

name: TeamLiquid StarLeague 5
description: The TeamLiquid StarLeague 5, announced on April 20, 2020, is the third TSL event held for StarCraft II, returning after an 8 years long hiatus.

name: Stay At Home Story Cup
description: The Stay at Home Story Cup #1, organised by Dennis "TaKe" Gehlen, is a online tournament where TaKe invites star players from around the world to compete online. This 2 day event was created due to the current COVID-19 situation and replaces the summer HSC 2020, which was postponed.

name: Intel Extreme Masters Katowice 2020
description: The Intel Extreme Masters (IEM) is ESL's flagship competition sponsored by Intel.
